title: Large-Scale Online Discussion Monitoring Strategy Design: Evaluative Literature Review-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online discussion platforms and foundational mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: A mathematics education course for current practitioners, focusing on establishing a non-real-time discussion monitoring system.

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three types of text-based interactions (information exchange, critical dialogue, collaborative problem-solving) in online discussions
Learners can systematically classify discussion content and write analytical reports using the Moderators' Assessment Matrix
Learners can design discussion participation evaluation criteria using monitoring tools and develop individualized feedback plans
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
